short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for capturing and analyzing screenshots with GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension utilizes advanced GPT-4o mini AI technology to assist users in accurately responding to test questions by analyzing and capturing on-screen content. It leverages powerful AI-driven capabilities to process visual inputs and generate intelligent answers in real time, optimizing test performance and ensuring precision. Designed for professionals and educators, this tool integrates seamlessly with modern web environments, offering an efficient, cost-effective solution for handling complex test evaluations and automated response generation.
